code: export var addLikeReducer=function addLikeReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADDLIKE':state=action.up;state[action.indx].likes=state[action.indx].likes+1;return state;default:return state;}};export default addLikeReducer;
